title: Remove “Open shareable preview image” option from admin dashboard

requirements.text: Remove the admin-dashboard UI option/action labeled “Open shareable preview image” so it is not shown anywhere within the admin dashboard experience (Dashboard page and any dashboard-related components/menus/actions).

quotes: Remove the "open shareable preview image" option from the dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: When viewing the admin dashboard route, there is no button/link/menu item labeled “Open shareable preview image”.
No dashboard UI interaction opens the shareable preview image in a new tab/window.
The removal does not affect non-dashboard pages (e.g., the public homepage) unless the removed control was actually shared/reused by the dashboard.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not remove or rename any generated image assets from frontend/public/assets/generated unless they are exclusively used by the removed dashboard option.
Do not change backend APIs or access control behavior.
